sense.name: rent property from somebody
sense.examples: I am leasing a country estate for the year. Should we lease a car for the trip? The company will lease a space by the tower.

sense.name: rent property to somebody
sense.examples: We leased our apartment to friends when we were abroad. The estate contains 300 new homes, about a third of which are leased to the council. It was agreed they would lease him the flat.
